resources.string: Before you start measuring make sure you are relaxed. Breathe deeply for 10-20 seconds, then press \'start measuring\' and place your finger on the camera in the next 5 seconds. After 30 seconds you\'ll see your result. A normal resting heart rate for adults ranges from 60 to 100 beats. A normal graph should look like that:
You can save your heart rate in the calendar to monitor your health.
